alert.errorSubmit: There was a problem with processing.
alert.failedApply: Failed to apply due to an error.

confirm.applyRestart:
The slideshow restarts.
Would you like to apply?
confirm.backup:
Do you really want to back up all your data?
The backed up content is saved as a `JSON` file.
confirm.remove: Do you really want to delete it?
confirm.reset:
Do you really want to reset all settings and slide data?
Once initialized, it cannot be recovered.
confirm.restart: Do you really want to restart?
confirm.restore:
Would you really want to restore all your data?
This operation will delete all current data.
confirm.selectGroup:
Would you like to use it as the slide of your choice?
If you change the slide, it starts over.

description.autoplayDelay: The amount of time to wait before the slide automatically transitions.
description.autoplayDirection: Set the direction in which the slide automatically transitions.
description.autoplayPauseOnHover: If you place the mouse over the slide area, autoplay is paused.
description.backup: Import or export all data in the slideshow.
description.captionAnimationSpeed: The higher the value, the faster the animation.
description.captionAnimationType: Select the caption transition when the slide changes.
description.captionPosition: Set position of the caption. ex) left,top
description.getJsonFile: Upload the JSON file to get the data.
description.group: Opens the slide group selection window.
description.hoverVisibleHud: If you overlay mouse, HUD will be hidden.
description.imageScale: Set the size of the slide image. ex) horizontal,vertical
description.importDataMethod: Select how to import your data.
description.information: If you have any comments on problems or improvements, please use the %{link} page.
description.initialNumber: This is the slide number displayed at the start. (Numbers from 0)
description.inputKeyOnGroup: Enter the key value for the slide group.
description.inputSlidesUrl: Please enter the slide URL address.
description.keyboardGuide: Pressing a keyboard shortcut as follows executes the function.
description.repeat: Moves the slide from last to first.
description.reset: Reset all settings and slide data.
description.selectGroup: Select the slide you want to use.
description.selectSlidesType2: If you change and apply the URL address method, the slide data will be lost.
description.setCategoryDescription: Set the description of the category.
description.setCategoryName: Set the name of the category.
description.swipe: Use swipe operations on touch devices
description.thumbnail: Open the thumbnail image list screen
description.touchHud: Toggles the HUD when clicking the mouse or touching the screen.
description.transitionType: Select the transition type when the slide changes.
description.visibleContents: Set the display of each controller and status.

header.information: You can check information about the slideshow.
header.slides: Set the parts related to the slide.
header.style: Set the parts displayed on the screen.

title.touchHud: Toggle HUD on click or touch
